entry.title: $2389 // NO FEE * 2BR * PROSPECT PARK * Laundry, Elevator, Gym, Roof Deck
entry.content:
NO FEE * 10 mins to Prospect Park * $2389

The Ballgreen Complex features all of the amenities you've come to expect from new developments, but with the added bonus of being a short walk away from Prospect Park.

*2/5 Train is 7 mis walk away; the Q a 10 mins walk

*Nearby Flatbush Avenue is teeming with deliciously hip restaurants (Midwood Flats, Honey Badger, Silver Rice, Lincoln Tavern, BlueBird, Kulushkat, El Patron, Greenhouse Cafe, Rizbo...), bars (Irv's, Westbury Inn, Parkside...) and Cafe's (Blessings, Cinnamon Girl, Bergen Bagels...)

*10 minutes to proximity to Prospect Park!

Unit & Building Features:

*Fitness Center
*Lounge
*Roof Top
*Laundry Room
*Elevator
*Air Conditioning
*Gorgeous Tiles
*Stainless Steel Appliances & Granite Counter Tops
*Hardwood Floors
*Beautiful Windows

Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Prospect Park South, Crown Heights, Flatbush, Prospect Park, Flatbush Avenue, 2 Train, 5 Train, Q Train, B Train, _Brooklyn_Living_
